CREATE VIEW [dbo].[ViewXOGRAdvertisementCaptureInfo] AS 

	SELECT h.Id,
	BusinessPointId = bp.id,
    CustomerCode = CAST(CustomerCode AS NVARCHAR(100)),
	CaptureDate = CAST(ISNULL([SnapshotCreatedOn],h.[CreatedOn]) AS DATETIME),
	[Version] = CAST( h.[Version] AS INT),
	[ListingType] = CAST( ListingType AS NVARCHAR(50)),
	[Type] = CAST( VersionType AS NVARCHAR(50)),
	[FriendlyUrl] = CAST( 'https://www.xo.gr/profile/'+FriendlyUrl+'/el/' AS NVARCHAR(255) ),
	Details = CAST([Changes] AS NVARCHAR(MAX)),
	SnapshotFile = CAST(SnapshotPath AS NVARCHAR(3500))
	FROM ITAPPS.xoupdate.XoListingHistory h
	join BusinessPoint bp on h.CustomerCode = bp.Code
	--WHERE IsCaptured = 1

named_assets.name: dbo.vw_LOCACities
named_assets.sql_normalized:
--ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_LOCACities]
AS


 select distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	  join  itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 on mlc1.pref = mlc2.pref and mlc1.flag = 'I'
	 where mlc1.LocId <> mlc2.LocId--a.GeoModelGC_Type = 'L' and bp.code = 10001
	 

union

----------LOCA Type2  -- Mainland plus Εύβοια, Κρήτη (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 60Km)

   select  distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city  collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 60 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag='M'


union

----------LOCA Type 3 -- Αττική (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 6Km)

  select  distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' 
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 6 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag = 'A'

----------LOCA Type 4 -- Θεσσαλονίκη


union

  select   distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 10 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag = 'T'
named_assets.sql_raw:
--ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_LOCACities]
AS


 select distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	  join  itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 on mlc1.pref = mlc2.pref and mlc1.flag = 'I'
	 where mlc1.LocId <> mlc2.LocId--a.GeoModelGC_Type = 'L' and bp.code = 10001
	 

union

----------LOCA Type2  -- Mainland plus Εύβοια, Κρήτη (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 60Km)

   select  distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city  collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 60 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag='M'


union

----------LOCA Type 3 -- Αττική (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 6Km)

  select  distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' 
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 6 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag = 'A'

----------LOCA Type 4 -- Θεσσαλονίκη


union

  select   distinct mlc1.LocId as Id
           , mlc2.LocId as value
		   , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai  +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text'
     from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 
	 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 
	 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 10 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0
	   and mlc1.flag = 'T'

named_assets.name: dbo.vw_RelatedBpBranches
named_assets.sql_normalized:
--ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_RelatedBpBranches]
AS



SELECT 
bp.code AS id,
tbp.Code +','+ CAST(2 AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
tbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+tbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id --and pr.Type in (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint tbp ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = tbp.id AND pr.Type IN (2,4)
WHERE bp.isactive = 1 AND tbp.isactive =1
--and bp.code = 123456
  
UNION

--Επιστρέφει όλα τα related bps της έδρας ενός υποκαταστήματος εκτός της έδρας 
SELECT  bp.code,--sbp.code,--related_bp.code,--,
related_bp.code +','+ CAST(all_pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
related_bp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+related_bp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN all_pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship all_pr ON sbp.id = all_pr.BusinessPointID AND all_pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint related_bp ON related_bp.id = all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID <> bp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 AND related_bp.IsActive = 1
--and bp.code = 123456

 --Επιστρέφει την έδρα ενός υποκαταστήματος

UNION 

SELECT  
bp.code,--related_bp.code,--sbp.code,
sbp.code +','+ CAST(pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
sbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+sbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 
   --and bp.code = 123456
named_assets.sql_raw:
--ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_RelatedBpBranches]
AS



SELECT 
bp.code AS id,
tbp.Code +','+ CAST(2 AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
tbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+tbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'

JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint tbp ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = tbp.id AND pr.Type IN (2,4)
WHERE bp.isactive = 1 AND tbp.isactive =1
--and bp.code = 123456
  
UNION

--Επιστρέφει όλα τα related bps της έδρας ενός υποκαταστήματος εκτός της έδρας 
SELECT  bp.code,--sbp.code,--related_bp.code,--,
related_bp.code +','+ CAST(all_pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
related_bp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+related_bp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN all_pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship all_pr ON sbp.id = all_pr.BusinessPointID AND all_pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint related_bp ON related_bp.id = all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID <> bp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 AND related_bp.IsActive = 1
--and bp.code = 123456

 --Επιστρέφει την έδρα ενός υποκαταστήματος

UNION 

SELECT  
bp.code,--related_bp.code,--sbp.code,
sbp.code +','+ CAST(pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5))  AS value,
sbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+sbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type =  2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text'
FROM dbo.businesspoint bp
JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4)
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 
   --and bp.code = 123456

named_assets.name: dbo.vwAgora
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vwAgora
AS
SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT CASE WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 0) THEN CAST('Ν' AS VARCHAR) WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 1) THEN CAST('Π' AS VARCHAR) 
                      WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 2) THEN CAST('Α' AS VARCHAR) END AS LossPrintedNew, Filter1.TaskName, Filter1.CustomerCode, Filter1.CustomerName, 
                      Filter1.StartDate, Filter1.EndDate, Filter1.OfferAmount, Filter1.LastSignedDate, Filter1.MasterClassification, Filter1.AppointmentDateTime, 
                      Filter1.ActualOwnerLastName, Filter1.SupervisorLastName, Filter1.ContractID
FROM         (SELECT     Extent1.ContractID, Extent1.CampaignID, Extent1.UnitID, Extent1.TargetGroupValueID, Extent1.SelectedAllocationPlanID, Extent1.TargetGroupItemID, 
                                              Extent1.CaseID, Extent1.TaskID, Extent1.TaskName, Extent1.TaskTypeID, Extent1.TaskCreatedOn, Extent1.ActualOwnerID, Extent1.ActualOwner, 
                                              Extent1.ActualOwnerFirstName, Extent1.ActualOwnerLastName, Extent1.SupervisorID, Extent1.Supervisor, Extent1.SupervisorFirstName, 
                                              Extent1.SupervisorLastName, Extent1.AppointmentDateTime, Extent1.BusinessPointID, Extent1.BPIdentityConfirmed, Extent1.CustomerName, 
                                              Extent1.CustomerCode, Extent1.Brandname, Extent1.EndDate, Extent1.StartDate, Extent1.IsReleased, Extent1.OfferAmount, Extent1.AddressLine1, 
                                              Extent1.AddressLine3, Extent1.ContactInfo, Extent1.ContactName, Extent1.CRM, Extent1.MasterClassification, Extent1.MasterHeading, Extent1.IsRed, 
                                              Extent1.Phones, Extent1.LossPrintedNew, Extent1.LastSignedDate, Extent2.LeftIndex, Extent2.RightIndex
                       FROM          (SELECT     ContractID, CampaignID, TaskStatus, CaseState, ActivityType, UnitID, TargetGroupValueID, SelectedAllocationPlanID, TargetGroupItemID, 
                                                                      CaseID, TaskID, TaskName, TaskTypeID, TaskCreatedOn, ActualOwnerID, ActualOwner, ActualOwnerFirstName, ActualOwnerLastName, 
                                                                      SupervisorID, Supervisor, SupervisorFirstName, SupervisorLastName, AppointmentDateTime, BusinessPointID, BPIdentityConfirmed, 
                                                                      CustomerName, CustomerCode, Brandname, EndDate, StartDate, IsReleased, OfferAmount, AddressLine1, AddressLine3, ContactInfo, 
                                                                      ContactName, CRM, MasterClassification, MasterHeading, IsRed, Phones, LossPrintedNew, LastSignedDate
                                               FROM          dbo.vwMarketValueContract AS ViewMarketItem) AS Extent1 INNER JOIN
                                              dbo.Unit AS Extent2 ON Extent1.UnitID = Extent2.ID
                       WHERE      (Extent1.StartDate IS NOT NULL) AND (Extent1.IsReleased = 1) AND (Extent1.StartDate IS NOT NULL) AND (Extent1.EndDate IS NOT NULL)) 
                      AS Filter1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.Unit AS Extent3 ON Filter1.LeftIndex >= Extent3.LeftIndex AND Filter1.RightIndex <= Extent3.RightIndex
WHERE     (Extent3.ID = 56) AND (Filter1.CampaignID = 13) AND (Filter1.StartDate >= '2011-07-01 00:00:00.000')
ORDER BY Filter1.AppointmentDateTime
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vwAgora
AS
SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT CASE WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 0) THEN CAST('Ν' AS VARCHAR) WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 1) THEN CAST('Π' AS VARCHAR) 
                      WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 2) THEN CAST('Α' AS VARCHAR) END AS LossPrintedNew, Filter1.TaskName, Filter1.CustomerCode, Filter1.CustomerName, 
                      Filter1.StartDate, Filter1.EndDate, Filter1.OfferAmount, Filter1.LastSignedDate, Filter1.MasterClassification, Filter1.AppointmentDateTime, 
                      Filter1.ActualOwnerLastName, Filter1.SupervisorLastName, Filter1.ContractID
FROM         (SELECT     Extent1.ContractID, Extent1.CampaignID, Extent1.UnitID, Extent1.TargetGroupValueID, Extent1.SelectedAllocationPlanID, Extent1.TargetGroupItemID, 
                                              Extent1.CaseID, Extent1.TaskID, Extent1.TaskName, Extent1.TaskTypeID, Extent1.TaskCreatedOn, Extent1.ActualOwnerID, Extent1.ActualOwner, 
                                              Extent1.ActualOwnerFirstName, Extent1.ActualOwnerLastName, Extent1.SupervisorID, Extent1.Supervisor, Extent1.SupervisorFirstName, 
                                              Extent1.SupervisorLastName, Extent1.AppointmentDateTime, Extent1.BusinessPointID, Extent1.BPIdentityConfirmed, Extent1.CustomerName, 
                                              Extent1.CustomerCode, Extent1.Brandname, Extent1.EndDate, Extent1.StartDate, Extent1.IsReleased, Extent1.OfferAmount, Extent1.AddressLine1, 
                                              Extent1.AddressLine3, Extent1.ContactInfo, Extent1.ContactName, Extent1.CRM, Extent1.MasterClassification, Extent1.MasterHeading, Extent1.IsRed, 
                                              Extent1.Phones, Extent1.LossPrintedNew, Extent1.LastSignedDate, Extent2.LeftIndex, Extent2.RightIndex
                       FROM          (SELECT     ContractID, CampaignID, TaskStatus, CaseState, ActivityType, UnitID, TargetGroupValueID, SelectedAllocationPlanID, TargetGroupItemID, 
                                                                      CaseID, TaskID, TaskName, TaskTypeID, TaskCreatedOn, ActualOwnerID, ActualOwner, ActualOwnerFirstName, ActualOwnerLastName, 
                                                                      SupervisorID, Supervisor, SupervisorFirstName, SupervisorLastName, AppointmentDateTime, BusinessPointID, BPIdentityConfirmed, 
                                                                      CustomerName, CustomerCode, Brandname, EndDate, StartDate, IsReleased, OfferAmount, AddressLine1, AddressLine3, ContactInfo, 
                                                                      ContactName, CRM, MasterClassification, MasterHeading, IsRed, Phones, LossPrintedNew, LastSignedDate
                                               FROM          dbo.vwMarketValueContract AS ViewMarketItem) AS Extent1 INNER JOIN
                                              dbo.Unit AS Extent2 ON Extent1.UnitID = Extent2.ID
                       WHERE      (Extent1.StartDate IS NOT NULL) AND (Extent1.IsReleased = 1) AND (Extent1.StartDate IS NOT NULL) AND (Extent1.EndDate IS NOT NULL)) 
                      AS Filter1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.Unit AS Extent3 ON Filter1.LeftIndex >= Extent3.LeftIndex AND Filter1.RightIndex <= Extent3.RightIndex
WHERE     (Extent3.ID = 56) AND (Filter1.CampaignID = 13) AND (Filter1.StartDate >= '2011-07-01 00:00:00.000')
ORDER BY Filter1.AppointmentDateTime

named_assets.name: dbo.vwAgoraAttiki24
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vwAgoraAttiki24
AS
SELECT     vae.LossPrintedNew AS E, vae.TaskName AS Περιγραφή, vae.CustomerCode AS Κωδικός, vae.CustomerName AS Όνομα, vae.StartDate AS Έναρξη, 
                      vae.EndDate AS Λήξη, vae.OfferAmount AS Προτυπωμένη, vae.LastSignedDate AS [Προηγ. Υπογραφή Συμβολαίου], vae.MasterClassification AS Κατηγορία, 
                      vae.AppointmentDateTime AS Ραντεβού, vae.ActualOwnerLastName AS Χρήστης, vae.SupervisorLastName AS Επιθεωρητής, vae.SubChannel AS ΥποΚανάλι, 
                      vae.Prefecture AS Νομός, vae.Municipality AS Δήμος, vae.City AS Πόλη, vae.Street AS Οδός, vae.ZipCode AS [Τ.Κ.], vae.MasterHeading AS [Κύρια Δραστηριότητα], 
                      vae.LastPrintSalesMan AS [Τελευταίος Πωλητής ( Print )], vae.LastInternetSalesMan AS [Τελευταίος Πωλητής ( Online )], 
                      vae.ExpirationDateInternet AS [Ημ/νια Λήξης Online], CASE WHEN ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, '') 
                      = '' THEN tgiv.AltOfferID ELSE tgiv.ContractID END AS [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
FROM         dbo.vwAgoraExtended AS vae INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON vae.TargetGroupValueID = tgiv.ID
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vwAgoraAttiki24
AS
SELECT     vae.LossPrintedNew AS E, vae.TaskName AS Περιγραφή, vae.CustomerCode AS Κωδικός, vae.CustomerName AS Όνομα, vae.StartDate AS Έναρξη, 
                      vae.EndDate AS Λήξη, vae.OfferAmount AS Προτυπωμένη, vae.LastSignedDate AS [Προηγ. Υπογραφή Συμβολαίου], vae.MasterClassification AS Κατηγορία, 
                      vae.AppointmentDateTime AS Ραντεβού, vae.ActualOwnerLastName AS Χρήστης, vae.SupervisorLastName AS Επιθεωρητής, vae.SubChannel AS ΥποΚανάλι, 
                      vae.Prefecture AS Νομός, vae.Municipality AS Δήμος, vae.City AS Πόλη, vae.Street AS Οδός, vae.ZipCode AS [Τ.Κ.], vae.MasterHeading AS [Κύρια Δραστηριότητα], 
                      vae.LastPrintSalesMan AS [Τελευταίος Πωλητής ( Print )], vae.LastInternetSalesMan AS [Τελευταίος Πωλητής ( Online )], 
                      vae.ExpirationDateInternet AS [Ημ/νια Λήξης Online], CASE WHEN ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, '') 
                      = '' THEN tgiv.AltOfferID ELSE tgiv.ContractID END AS [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]
FROM         dbo.vwAgoraExtended AS vae INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON vae.TargetGroupValueID = tgiv.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.vwAgoraExtended
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vwAgoraExtended
AS
SELECT      CASE WHEN ([Project1].[LossPrintedNew] = 0) THEN CAST('Ν' AS VARCHAR) WHEN ([Project1].[LossPrintedNew] = 1) THEN CAST('Π' AS VARCHAR) 
                      WHEN ([Project1].[LossPrintedNew] = 2) THEN CAST('Α' AS VARCHAR) END AS LossPrintedNew, [Project1].TaskName, [Project1].CustomerCode, 
                      [Project1].CustomerName, [Project1].StartDate, [Project1].EndDate, [Project1].OfferAmount, [Project1].LastSignedDate, [Project1].MasterClassification, 
                      [Project1].AppointmentDateTime, [Project1].ActualOwnerLastName, [Project1].SupervisorLastName, [Project1].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel], 
                      [Project1].[Prefecture] AS [Prefecture], [Project1].[Municipality] AS [Municipality], [Project1].[City] AS [City], [Project1].[Street] AS [Street], 
                      [Project1].[ZipCode] AS [ZipCode], [Project1].[MasterHeading] AS [MasterHeading], [Project1].[LastPrintSalesMan] AS [LastPrintSalesMan], 
                      [Project1].[LastInternetSalesMan] AS [LastInternetSalesMan], [Project1].[ExpirationDateInternet] AS [ExpirationDateInternet], [Project1].[TargetGroupValueID]
FROM         (SELECT     [Project1].[CampaignID] AS [CampaignID], [Project1].[UnitID] AS [UnitID], [Project1].[TargetGroupValueID] AS [TargetGroupValueID], 
                                              [Project1].[SelectedAllocationPlanID] AS [SelectedAllocationPlanID], [Project1].[TargetGroupItemID] AS [TargetGroupItemID], [Project1].[CaseID] AS [CaseID], 
                                              [Project1].[TaskID] AS [TaskID], [Project1].[TaskName] AS [TaskName], [Project1].[TaskTypeID] AS [TaskTypeID], 
                                              [Project1].[TaskCreatedOn] AS [TaskCreatedOn], [Project1].[ActualOwnerID] AS [ActualOwnerID], [Project1].[ActualOwner] AS [ActualOwner], 
                                              [Project1].[ActualOwnerFirstName] AS [ActualOwnerFirstName], [Project1].[ActualOwnerLastName] AS [ActualOwnerLastName], 
                                              [Project1].[SupervisorID] AS [SupervisorID], [Project1].[Supervisor] AS [Supervisor], [Project1].[SupervisorFirstName] AS [SupervisorFirstName], 
                                              [Project1].[SupervisorLastName] AS [SupervisorLastName], [Project1].[AppointmentDateTime] AS [AppointmentDateTime], 
                                              [Project1].[BusinessPointID] AS [BusinessPointID], [Project1].[BPIdentityConfirmed] AS [BPIdentityConfirmed], 
                                              [Project1].[CustomerName] AS [CustomerName], [Project1].[CustomerCode] AS [CustomerCode], [Project1].[BrandName] AS [BrandName], 
                                              [Project1].[EndDate] AS [EndDate], [Project1].[StartDate] AS [StartDate], [Project1].[IsReleased] AS [IsReleased], [Project1].[OfferAmount] AS [OfferAmount], 
                                              [Project1].[AddressLine1] AS [AddressLine1], [Project1].[AddressLine3] AS [AddressLine3], [Project1].[ContactInfo] AS [ContactInfo], 
                                              [Project1].[ContactName] AS [ContactName], [Project1].[CRM] AS [CRM], [Project1].[MasterClassification] AS [MasterClassification], 
                                              [Project1].[MasterHeading] AS [MasterHeading], [Project1].[Phones] AS [Phones], [Project1].[LossPrintedNew] AS [LossPrintedNew], 
                                              [Project1].[LastSignedDate] AS [LastSignedDate], [Project1].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel], [Project1].[Prefecture] AS [Prefecture], 
                                              [Project1].[Municipality] AS [Municipality], [Project1].[City] AS [City], [Project1].[Street] AS [Street], [Project1].[ZipCode] AS [ZipCode], 
                                              [Project1].[LastPrintSalesMan] AS [LastPrintSalesMan], [Project1].[LastInternetSalesMan] AS [LastInternetSalesMan], 
                                              [Project1].[ExpirationDateInternet] AS [ExpirationDateInternet], [Project1].[C1] AS [C1], row_number() OVER (ORDER BY [Project1].[TaskCreatedOn] DESC) 
                      AS [row_number]
FROM         (SELECT     [Extent1].[CampaignID] AS [CampaignID], [Extent1].[UnitID] AS [UnitID], [Extent1].[TargetGroupValueID] AS [TargetGroupValueID], 
                                              [Extent1].[SelectedAllocationPlanID] AS [SelectedAllocationPlanID], [Extent1].[TargetGroupItemID] AS [TargetGroupItemID], [Extent1].[CaseID] AS [CaseID],

                                              THEN cast(0 AS bit) END AS [C1]
                       FROM          (SELECT     [ViewMarketItem].[CampaignID] AS [CampaignID], [ViewMarketItem].[TaskStatus] AS [TaskStatus], [ViewMarketItem].[CaseState] AS [CaseState], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[ActivityType] AS [ActivityType], [ViewMarketItem].[UnitID] AS [UnitID],

                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[TaskCreatedOn] AS [TaskCreatedOn], [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwnerID] AS [ActualOwnerID], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwner] AS [ActualOwner], [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwnerFirstName] AS [ActualOwnerFirstName], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwnerLastName] AS [ActualOwnerLastName], [ViewMarketItem].[SupervisorID] AS [SupervisorID], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[Supervisor] AS [Supervisor], [ViewMarketItem].[SupervisorFirstName] AS [SupervisorFirstName], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[SupervisorLastName] AS [SupervisorLastName], [ViewMarketItem].[AppointmentDateTime] AS [AppointmentDateTime], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[BusinessPointID] AS [BusinessPointID], [ViewMarketItem].[BPIdentityConfirmed] AS [BPIdentityConfirmed], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[CustomerName] AS [CustomerName], [ViewMarketItem].[CustomerCode] AS [CustomerCode], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[BrandName] AS [BrandName], [ViewMarketItem].[EndDate] AS [EndDate], [ViewMarketItem].[StartDate] AS [StartDate], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[IsReleased] AS [IsReleased], [ViewMarketItem].[OfferAmount] AS [OfferAmount], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[AddressLine1] AS [AddressLine1], [ViewMarketItem].[AddressLine3] AS [AddressLine3], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[ContactInfo] AS [ContactInfo], [ViewMarketItem].[ContactName] AS [ContactName], [ViewMarketItem].[CRM] AS [CRM], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[MasterClassification] AS [MasterClassification], [ViewMarketItem].[MasterHeading] AS [MasterHeading],

                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[LastSignedDate] AS [LastSignedDate], [ViewMarketItem].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel],

                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[LastInternetSalesMan] AS [LastInternetSalesMan], [ViewMarketItem].[ExpirationDateInternet] AS [ExpirationDateInternet]
                                               FROM          [dbo].[ViewMarketItem] AS [ViewMarketItem]) AS [Extent1] INNER JOIN
                                              [dbo].[Unit] AS [Extent2] ON [Extent1].[UnitID] = [Extent2].[ID] CROSS JOIN
                                              [dbo].[Unit] AS [Extent3]
                       WHERE      ([Extent1].[StartDate] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Extent1].[EndDate] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Extent1].[CampaignID] = 13) AND 
                                              ([Extent2].[LeftIndex] >= [Extent3].[LeftIndex]) AND ([Extent2].[RightIndex] <= [Extent3].[RightIndex]) AND ([Extent3].[ID] = 56) 
                                              /*AND ( [Extent1].[EndDate] >= '2013-03-10 00:00:00' )*/ AND ([Extent1].[IsReleased] = 1) AND ([Extent1].[StartDate] IS NOT NULL) 
                                              /*AND ( [Extent1].[StartDate] <= '2012-03-13 00:00:00' )*/ AND ([Extent1].[EndDate] IS NOT NULL)/*AND ( [Extent1].[EndDate] >= '2013-03-10 00:00:00' )*/ ) 
                      AS [Project1]) AS [Project1]
WHERE     [Project1].[row_number] > 0

                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[LastSignedDate] AS [LastSignedDate], [ViewMarketItem].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[Prefecture] AS [Prefecture], [ViewMarketItem].[Municipality] AS [Municipality], [ViewMarketItem].[City] AS [City], 
                                                                      [ViewMarketItem].[Street] AS [Street], [ViewMarketItem].[ZipCode] AS [ZipCode], [ViewMarketItem].[LastPrintSalesMan] AS [LastPrintSalesMan],

CREATE VIEW dbo.vwMarketValueContract
AS
SELECT     camp.ID AS CampaignID, task.Status AS TaskStatus, ca.State AS CaseState, tt.ActivityType, actualOwner.UnitID, tgiv.ID AS TargetGroupValueID, 
                      camp.SelectedAllocationPlanID, tgi.ID AS TargetGroupItemID, task.CaseID, task.ID AS TaskID, task.Description AS TaskName, task.TaskTypeID, 
                      task.CreatedOn AS TaskCreatedOn, task.ActualOwnerID, ISNULL(actualOwner.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(actualOwner.FirstName, '') AS ActualOwner, 
                      actualOwner.FirstName AS ActualOwnerFirstName, actualOwner.LastName AS ActualOwnerLastName, supervisor.ID AS SupervisorID, ISNULL(supervisor.LastName, '') 
                      + ' ' + ISNULL(supervisor.FirstName, '') AS Supervisor, supervisor.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName, supervisor.LastName AS SupervisorLastName, 
                      tgiv.AppointmentDateTime, tgi.BusinessPointID, tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed, tgi.CustomerName, tgi.Code AS CustomerCode, tgi.Brandname, tgiv.EndDate, tgiv.StartDate, 
                      tgiv.IsReleased, tgiv.TargetValue AS OfferAmount, tgi.StreetName + ' ' + tgi.StreetNumber AS AddressLine1, tgi.City AS AddressLine3, CONVERT(nvarchar(250), '') 
                      AS ContactInfo, CONVERT(nvarchar(50), '') AS ContactName, bp.HasCRMTicket AS CRM, cn.Name AS MasterClassification, tgi.MainHeadingName AS MasterHeading, 
                      0 AS IsRed, CONVERT(nvarchar(250), '') AS Phones, tgiv.LossPrintedNew, tgiv.LastSignedDate, tgiv.ContractID
FROM         dbo.Campaign AS camp INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItem AS tgi ON camp.ID = tgi.CampaignID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.ClassifierNode AS cn ON bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID = cn.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.[Case] AS ca ON tgiv.ID = ca.ContextEntityID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CaseType AS ct ON ca.CaseTypeID = ct.ID AND ct.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' INNER JOIN
                      dbo.Task AS task ON ca.ID = task.CaseID AND task.Status = 0 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TaskType AS tt ON task.TaskTypeID = tt.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS actualOwner ON task.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS supervisor ON tgiv.Supervisor = supervisor.ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.vwMarketValueContract
AS
SELECT     camp.ID AS CampaignID, task.Status AS TaskStatus, ca.State AS CaseState, tt.ActivityType, actualOwner.UnitID, tgiv.ID AS TargetGroupValueID, 
                      camp.SelectedAllocationPlanID, tgi.ID AS TargetGroupItemID, task.CaseID, task.ID AS TaskID, task.Description AS TaskName, task.TaskTypeID, 
                      task.CreatedOn AS TaskCreatedOn, task.ActualOwnerID, ISNULL(actualOwner.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(actualOwner.FirstName, '') AS ActualOwner, 
                      actualOwner.FirstName AS ActualOwnerFirstName, actualOwner.LastName AS ActualOwnerLastName, supervisor.ID AS SupervisorID, ISNULL(supervisor.LastName, '') 
                      + ' ' + ISNULL(supervisor.FirstName, '') AS Supervisor, supervisor.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName, supervisor.LastName AS SupervisorLastName, 
                      tgiv.AppointmentDateTime, tgi.BusinessPointID, tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed, tgi.CustomerName, tgi.Code AS CustomerCode, tgi.Brandname, tgiv.EndDate, tgiv.StartDate, 
                      tgiv.IsReleased, tgiv.TargetValue AS OfferAmount, tgi.StreetName + ' ' + tgi.StreetNumber AS AddressLine1, tgi.City AS AddressLine3, CONVERT(nvarchar(250), '') 
                      AS ContactInfo, CONVERT(nvarchar(50), '') AS ContactName, bp.HasCRMTicket AS CRM, cn.Name AS MasterClassification, tgi.MainHeadingName AS MasterHeading, 
                      0 AS IsRed, CONVERT(nvarchar(250), '') AS Phones, tgiv.LossPrintedNew, tgiv.LastSignedDate, tgiv.ContractID
FROM         dbo.Campaign AS camp INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItem AS tgi ON camp.ID = tgi.CampaignID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.ClassifierNode AS cn ON bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID = cn.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.[Case] AS ca ON tgiv.ID = ca.ContextEntityID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CaseType AS ct ON ca.CaseTypeID = ct.ID AND ct.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' INNER JOIN
                      dbo.Task AS task ON ca.ID = task.CaseID AND task.Status = 0 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TaskType AS tt ON task.TaskTypeID = tt.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS actualOwner ON task.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS supervisor ON tgiv.Supervisor = supervisor.ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.vwSuperGrid
AS
SELECT     vtg.UDFString02 AS [Κωδ. Πελάτη], vtg.Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue AS [Προτυπωμένη Αξία], vtg.Description AS Υποκανάλι, vtg.HandlerName AS [Σ.Δ. - Ανάθεση], 
                      vtg.SupervisorName AS Επιθεωρητής, Y01PSalesrep.ID AS [Πωλητής - Y01 - Print], Y01OSalesrep.ID AS [OnlineSalesRepIDΠωλητής - Y01 - Online], 
                      vtg.ExpirationDateInternet AS [Ελάχιστη ημερομηνία λήξης], vtg.SubscriptionSignDate AS [Ημερομηνία υπογραφής συνδρομητικού], 
                      vtg.Y01PrintSignDate AS [Ημερομηνία υπογραφής τελευταίου print]
FROM         dbo.ViewTargetGroupItemInfo AS vtg INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan AS cap ON vtg.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cap.ID AND cap.PlanType = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y01PSalesrep ON vtg.Y01PSalesrep = Y01PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y02PSalesrep ON vtg.Y02PSalesrep = Y02PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y01OSalesrep ON vtg.Y01OSalesrep = Y01OSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y02OSalesrep ON vtg.Y02OSalesrep = Y02OSalesrep.ID
WHERE     (vtg.CampaignID = 14)

                      UsrInspector.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Επιθεωρητή], vtg.SupervisorName AS Επιθεωρητής

                      dbo.[User] AS Usr ON vtg.HandlerUserID = Usr.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS UsrInspector ON vtg.Supervisor = UsrInspector.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON vtg.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID
WHERE     (vtg.CampaignID = 6) AND (tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1)
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE VIEW dbo.vwSuperGridPrePrinted
AS
SELECT     vtg.UDFString02 AS [Κωδ. Πελάτη], vtg.CustomerName AS [Επωνυμία Πελάτη], Usr.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Σ.Δ.], vtg.HandlerName AS [Σ.Δ. - Ανάθεση], 
                      UsrInspector.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Επιθεωρητή], vtg.SupervisorName AS Επιθεωρητής
FROM         dbo.ViewTargetGroupItemInfo AS vtg INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan AS cap ON vtg.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cap.ID AND cap.PlanType = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y01PSalesrep ON vtg.Y01PSalesrep = Y01PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y02PSalesrep ON vtg.Y02PSalesrep = Y02PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y01OSalesrep ON vtg.Y01OSalesrep = Y01OSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Y02OSalesrep ON vtg.Y02OSalesrep = Y02OSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS Usr ON vtg.HandlerUserID = Usr.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.[User] AS UsrInspector ON vtg.Supervisor = UsrInspector.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON vtg.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID
WHERE     (vtg.CampaignID = 6) AND (tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1)

named_assets.sql_normalized:
/*==============================================================*/
/* View: WorkflowContractView                                   */
/*==============================================================*/
create view [dbo].[WorkflowContractView] as
with CaseTaskInfo as
(
select
	 CaseID = c.ID
	,CaseState = c.[State]
	,C.MasterCaseID
	,C.CaseTypeID
	,C.ContextEntityID
	,C.ContextEntityType
	,TaskID = t.ID 
	,TaskStatus = t.[Status] 
	,TaskCreatedOn = t.CreatedOn
	,TaskDescription = t.[Description]
    ,TaskOutcome = T.Outcome
	,TaskTypeID = TT.ID
	,TT.ActivityType 
    ,ActualOwnerID  = AO.ID 
    ,ActualOwnerUserName = AO.UserName  --FYI: Actual Owner
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID = POU.ID  
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName = POU.UserName  -- FYI: Potential Onwer as User
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID = R.ID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole = R.[Description]  -- FYI: Potential Owner as Role    
from [Case] C with (nolock)
JOIN CaseType CT with (nolock) ON C.CaseTypeID = CT.ID
JOIN Task T with (nolock) ON T.CaseID = C.ID 
JOIN TaskType TT with (nolock) ON T.TaskTypeID = TT.ID 
LEFT JOIN [User] AO with (nolock) ON T.ActualOwnerID = AO.ID
LEFT JOIN TaskAssignment TA with (nolock) ON T.ID = TA.TaskID and ta.AssignmentType = 0
LEFT JOIN [User] POU with (nolock) ON TA.UserID = POU.ID
LEFT JOIN [Role] R with (nolock) ON TA.RoleID = R.ID
)
, finalReport as
(

--FYI: The following select returns a list of contracts that have not been completed 

SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= NULL 
    ,Medium				= NULL 
    ,AdvState			= convert(nvarchar(100),NULL )
    ,TaskID 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,TaskCreatedOn
    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=1
FROM dbo.ViewContract fcv with (nolock)
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = TGIV.ID
					AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'  
					AND cti.[CaseState] = 0
					AND cti.[TaskStatus] = 0
					AND cti.ActivityType = 'H'  
UNION ALL
--FYI: The following select returns a list of Advertisement that have not been completed
SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= fcv.Adv_ProductName
    ,Medium				= MV.Name 
    ,AdvState			= CASE fcv.Adv_QA WHEN 0 THEN 'Σε εκκρεμότητα'
										  WHEN 1 THEN 'Ολοκληρωμένη' END 
    ,TaskID 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,TaskCreatedOn
    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=2
FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock)
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = fcv.Adv_ID
						AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
						AND cti.[CaseState] = 0
						AND cti.[TaskStatus] = 0  
						AND cti.ActivityType = 'H'
UNION ALL
--FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that 
--have been completed and passed QA
--     during T01 (Έλεγχος πληρότητας) of P101
 SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= fcv.Adv_ProductName
    ,Medium				= MV.Name 
    ,AdvState			=    case 
    when exists (	select 1
						from dbo.UdacProdRole as upr with (nolock)
						where p.UdacID = upr.UdacID )
			and not exists (
						Select 1 
						from dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock)
						where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID
						and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104)
						and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID
						)				
    then 'Χωρίς παραμετροποίηση'
	when exists (Select 1 from
							dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock)
						join dbo.Task advTask with (nolock) on advCase.ID = advTask.CaseID
						where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID
						and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104)
						and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID
						--and advTask.TaskTypeID = 193 and 
						--and advTask.[Status] = 1
						--and advTask.ActualOwnerID is not null
						) and adv.DenyExtraction = 0						 
	then 'Ολοκληρωμένη'	
	when exists (Select 1 from
							dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock)
						join dbo.Task advTask with (nolock) on advCase.ID = advTask.CaseID
						where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID
						and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104)
						and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID
						--and advTask.TaskTypeID = 193 and 
						--and advTask.[Status] = 1
						--and advTask.ActualOwnerID is not null
						) and adv.DenyExtraction = 1
	then 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή'							 
	else 'Αυτόματη Ολοκλήρωση'	 
	end

    ,TaskID
    ,TaskDescription
    ,TaskCreatedOn
    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=3
from CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock)				
join dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv with (nolock) on cti.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID
				and cti.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
				and cti.TaskTypeID = 189
				and cti.TaskStatus = 1
				and cti.TaskOutcome in ( 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση','Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις')
join dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock) on ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
							and fcv.Adv_ProductIsComposite = 0
							AND fcv.Adv_QA = 1
join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID
join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID 
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
where 
not exists (select 1 from [Case] ca with (nolock) where ca.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' and ca.ContextEntityID = adv.ID)
--not exists   (Select 1 from
--							dbo.[Case] ca
--						join dbo.Task ta on ca.ID = ta.CaseID
--						where tgiv.ID = ca.ContextEntityID
--						and ta.TaskTypeID in (195,500) 
--						and ta.[Status] = 1
--						)	
					 
UNION ALL
--FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that
-- have been completed and passed QA
--     during T06 (Οριστικοποίηση κατασκευής) of P101
SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= fcv.Adv_ProductName
    ,Medium				= MV.Name 
	,AdvState			= 'Ακύρωση'
    ,TaskID 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,TaskCreatedOn
    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=5
FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock)
join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID
join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID 
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = adv.ID
					 AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
WHERE 
	--cti.[CaseState] = 1 AND -- removed due to bi465
	cti.[TaskStatus] = 1 
	and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ακύρωση'
	AND fcv.Adv_QA = 0 
	and fcv.CP_State = 3 -- cancelled
	
--AND cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' --BI-708

--and exists(	select 1 
--			from Task T1 
--			where cti.CaseID = T1.CaseID 
--			and T1.TaskTypeID = 189) 
UNION ALL
--FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that
-- have been completed and passed QA
--     during T06 (Οριστικοποίηση κατασκευής) of P101
SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= fcv.Adv_ProductName
    ,Medium				= MV.Name 
	,AdvState			=    case 
    when adv.DenyExtraction = 1
    then 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή'					 
	else 'Ολοκληρωμένη'								 	
	end
    ,TaskID 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,TaskCreatedOn
    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=4
FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock)
join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID
join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID 
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
JOIN [Case] c with (nolock) on TGIV.ID = c.ContextEntityID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON c.ID = cti.MasterCaseID and cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' and cti.ContextEntityID = adv.ID
WHERE 
cti.[TaskStatus] = 1 
and (
(cti.TaskTypeID = 193 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σύνθετη καταχώρηση δεν παρουσιάζει λάθη')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 508 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση Χωρίς Κατασκεύη')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 521 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 526 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 515 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 518)
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 522 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 527 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις')
)
--AND cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' --BI-708
AND fcv.Adv_QA = 1
--and exists(	select 1 
--			from Task T1 
--			where cti.CaseID = T1.CaseID 
--			and T1.TaskTypeID = 189)
)
select
ROW_NUMBER() 
        OVER (ORDER BY ContractID) as ID,
     TaskID 
    ,BusinessPointCode 
    ,BrandName 
    ,ContractID 
    ,ContractState 
    ,ContractDate 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,ProductName 
    ,Medium 
    ,AdvState 
    ,TaskCreatedOn 
    ,ActualOwnerID 
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag 
from finalReport fr

/*==============================================================*/
/* View: WorkflowContractView                                   */
/*==============================================================*/
create view [dbo].[WorkflowContractView] as
with CaseTaskInfo as
(
select
	 CaseID = c.ID
	,CaseState = c.[State]
	,C.MasterCaseID
	,C.CaseTypeID
	,C.ContextEntityID
	,C.ContextEntityType
	,TaskID = t.ID 
	,TaskStatus = t.[Status] 
	,TaskCreatedOn = t.CreatedOn
	,TaskDescription = t.[Description]
    ,TaskOutcome = T.Outcome
	,TaskTypeID = TT.ID
	,TT.ActivityType 
    ,ActualOwnerID  = AO.ID 
    ,ActualOwnerUserName = AO.UserName  --FYI: Actual Owner
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID = POU.ID  
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName = POU.UserName  -- FYI: Potential Onwer as User
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID = R.ID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole = R.[Description]  -- FYI: Potential Owner as Role    
from [Case] C with (nolock)
JOIN CaseType CT with (nolock) ON C.CaseTypeID = CT.ID
JOIN Task T with (nolock) ON T.CaseID = C.ID 
JOIN TaskType TT with (nolock) ON T.TaskTypeID = TT.ID 
LEFT JOIN [User] AO with (nolock) ON T.ActualOwnerID = AO.ID
LEFT JOIN TaskAssignment TA with (nolock) ON T.ID = TA.TaskID and ta.AssignmentType = 0
LEFT JOIN [User] POU with (nolock) ON TA.UserID = POU.ID
LEFT JOIN [Role] R with (nolock) ON TA.RoleID = R.ID
)
, finalReport as
(

--FYI: The following select returns a list of contracts that have not been completed 

SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID

    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State

FROM dbo.ViewContract fcv with (nolock)
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = TGIV.ID
					AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'  
					AND cti.[CaseState] = 0
					AND cti.[TaskStatus] = 0
					AND cti.ActivityType = 'H'  
UNION ALL
--FYI: The following select returns a list of Advertisement that have not been completed
SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= fcv.Adv_ProductName
    ,Medium				= MV.Name 
    ,AdvState			= CASE fcv.Adv_QA WHEN 0 THEN 'Σε εκκρεμότητα'
										  WHEN 1 THEN 'Ολοκληρωμένη' END 
    ,TaskID 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,TaskCreatedOn
    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=2
FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock)
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = fcv.Adv_ID
						AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' 
						AND cti.[CaseState] = 0
						AND cti.[TaskStatus] = 0  
						AND cti.ActivityType = 'H'
UNION ALL
--FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that 
--have been completed and passed QA
--     during T01 (Έλεγχος πληρότητας) of P101
 SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= fcv.Adv_ProductName
    ,Medium				= MV.Name 
    ,AdvState			=    case 
    when exists (	select 1
						from dbo.UdacProdRole as upr with (nolock)
						where p.UdacID = upr.UdacID )
			and not exists (
						Select 1 
						from dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock)
						where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID
						and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104)
						and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID
						)				
    then 'Χωρίς παραμετροποίηση'
	when exists (Select 1 from
							dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock)
						join dbo.Task advTask with (nolock) on advCase.ID = advTask.CaseID
						where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID
						and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104)
						and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID
						--and advTask.TaskTypeID = 193 and 
						--and advTask.[Status] = 1
						--and advTask.ActualOwnerID is not null
						) and adv.DenyExtraction = 0						 
	then 'Ολοκληρωμένη'	
	when exists (Select 1 from
							dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock)
						join dbo.Task advTask with (nolock) on advCase.ID = advTask.CaseID
						where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID
						and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104)
						and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID
						--and advTask.TaskTypeID = 193 and 
						--and advTask.[Status] = 1
						--and advTask.ActualOwnerID is not null
						) and adv.DenyExtraction = 1
	then 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή'

    ,TaskID

    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=3
from CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock)				
join dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv with (nolock) on cti.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID
				and cti.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
				and cti.TaskTypeID = 189
				and cti.TaskStatus = 1
				and cti.TaskOutcome in ( 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση','Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις')
join dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock) on ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
							and fcv.Adv_ProductIsComposite = 0
							AND fcv.Adv_QA = 1
join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID
join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID 
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
where 
not exists (select 1 from [Case] ca with (nolock) where ca.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' and ca.ContextEntityID = adv.ID)
--not exists   (Select 1 from
--							dbo.[Case] ca
--						join dbo.Task ta on ca.ID = ta.CaseID
--						where tgiv.ID = ca.ContextEntityID
--						and ta.TaskTypeID in (195,500) 
--						and ta.[Status] = 1
--						)	
					 
UNION ALL
--FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that
-- have been completed and passed QA
--     during T06 (Οριστικοποίηση κατασκευής) of P101
SELECT 
	 ContractID			= fcv.C_ID
    ,BusinessPointCode	= fcv.A_BPCode
    ,BrandName			= fcv.A_BPName
    ,ContractState		= fcv.C_State
    ,ContractDate		= fcv.C_Signdate
    ,ProductName		= fcv.Adv_ProductName
    ,Medium				= MV.Name 
	,AdvState			= 'Ακύρωση'
    ,TaskID 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,TaskCreatedOn
    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName

FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock)
join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID
join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID 
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = adv.ID
					 AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV'
WHERE 
	--cti.[CaseState] = 1 AND -- removed due to bi465
	cti.[TaskStatus] = 1 
	and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ακύρωση'
	AND fcv.Adv_QA = 0

	end

    ,ActualOwnerID
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag=4
FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock)
join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID
join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID 
JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID
JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID
JOIN [Case] c with (nolock) on TGIV.ID = c.ContextEntityID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV'
JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON c.ID = cti.MasterCaseID and cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' and cti.ContextEntityID = adv.ID
WHERE 
cti.[TaskStatus] = 1 
and (
(cti.TaskTypeID = 193 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σύνθετη καταχώρηση δεν παρουσιάζει λάθη')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 508 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση Χωρίς Κατασκεύη')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 521 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 526 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 515 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 518)
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 522 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις')
or (cti.TaskTypeID = 527 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις')
)
--AND cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' --BI-708
AND fcv.Adv_QA = 1
--and exists(	select 1 
--			from Task T1 
--			where cti.CaseID = T1.CaseID 
--			and T1.TaskTypeID = 189)
)
select
ROW_NUMBER() 
        OVER (ORDER BY ContractID) as ID,
     TaskID 
    ,BusinessPointCode 
    ,BrandName 
    ,ContractID 
    ,ContractState 
    ,ContractDate 
    ,TaskDescription 
    ,ProductName 
    ,Medium 
    ,AdvState 
    ,TaskCreatedOn 
    ,ActualOwnerID 
    ,ActualOwnerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerUserID
    ,PotentialOwenerUserName
    ,PotentialOwnerRoleID 
    ,PotentialOwnerRole 
    ,Flag 
from finalReport fr

named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[XO_active_banners_vw]
AS
WITH 
bd AS
(
SELECT IL07_CT05_Id = fccv.Adv_ID
      ,DR02_Code = mv.Code
      ,DR10_Code = fccv.Adv_VersionSectionCode 
      ,CM15_Id =CAST(fccv.C_BPCode AS INTEGER)  
      ,CM22_Name = bp.BrandName  
      ,CM22_BrandName = fccv.CP_BpName
      ,campaign = '-H' + CAST(ISNULL(mh.Code,'') AS VARCHAR)
				+ '-C' + CAST(bp.Code AS VARCHAR) 
				+ '-' + CAST (fccv.C_ID AS VARCHAR)  
				+ '-' + CAST (Fccv.Adv_ID AS VARCHAR)
      ,UD02_Code = fccv.Adv_ProductCode
      ,HD06_FCode =  REPLACE ( fvv.Branch,'-','.EL.') +
					 CASE WHEN  fvv.Branch IS NOT NULL THEN '.EL.' ELSE NULL END 
      ,HD05_PrintedName = vgi.Description  
      ,CT04_SignDate = fccv.C_Signdate
      ,CT23_StartDate = fccv.Adv_BeginDate
      ,CT05_ExpirationDate = fccv.Adv_EndDate
      ,ContractCode = fccv.C_ID 
      ,CT04_Code = fccv.C_MigratedCode
      ,Adv_ProductID
      ,CP_ID
      ,C_State
FROM dbo.FullContractView fccv 
JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp  ON fccv.C_BPID = bp.ID
JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs  ON vs.ID = fccv.Adv_VersionSectionID
JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv  ON vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID
LEFT JOIN	dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi 
	 JOIN	dbo.MasterHeading mh  ON vgi.SourceHeadingID = mh.ID
	 JOIN dbo.[FullVGIView]  fvv  ON vgi.ID= fvv.VGIID
         ON fccv.Adv_HeadingID = vgi.ID 
JOIN	dbo.ProductPart pp  ON fccv.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID 
JOIN	dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd  ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID 
WHERE fccv.Adv_ProductCode IN ('ABN', 'ABT', 'CB1', 'CB1E', 'CB2', 'CB2E', 'CB3', 'CB3E'
, 'CT1', 'CT1E', 'CT2', 'CT2E', 'CT3', 'CT3E', 'HB', 'HT'
, 'RB1', 'RB2', 'RB3', 'SB', 'ST', 'TU'
, 'LTAS1','LTAS2', 'LTAS3', 'LTAS1B', 'LTAS2B', 'LTAS3B'
, '6M_CB1', '6M_CB2', '6M_CB3', '6M_CT1', '6M_CT2', '6M_CT3'
, '6M_LTAS1', '6M_LTAS1B', '6M_LTAS2', '6M_LTAS2B', '6M_LTAS3', '6M_LTAS3B' ,'DPPMB','HTMLLTAS2','HTMLLTAS2B'
,'LTAS1_PROMO2015','LTAS2_PROMO2015','LTAS3_PROMO2015','LTAS1B_PROMO2015','LTAS2B_PROMO2015','LTAS3B_PROMO2015','CB1_PROMO2015','CB2_PROMO2015','CB3_PROMO2015' )
AND fccv.Adv_EndDate >= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND fccv.Adv_QA='true'
--AND c_id != 1906941
/******AND fccv.C_BPCode NOT IN  ('1289984','1440597','1541556')******/
)
, Cavs AS 
(
	SELECT a.advID, a.cadName, cav.Value cavValue
	FROM (
	SELECT bd.IL07_CT05_Id advID, cadAnim.NAME cadName, CavID=  MAX(cavAnim.ID)
	FROM bd  
	JOIN	dbo.ProductPart pp  ON bd.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID 
	JOIN	dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd  ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID 

	JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cadAnim  ON ppd.ID = cadAnim.ProductPartDefinitionID 
													AND cadAnim.NAME IN ('Αρχείο Animation','URL','oxScript','oxPrepend','oxAppend','oxService' )
	JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cavAnim  ON cavAnim.ContractProductID = bd.CP_ID 
											   AND cavAnim.AdvertisementID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id
											   AND cavAnim.ProductPartID = pp.ID 
											   AND cavAnim.ContentAttributeDefinitionID = cadAnim.ID
											   AND cavAnim.Value IS NOT NULL
	GROUP BY bd.IL07_CT05_Id, cadAnim.NAME
	) a
	JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav ON a.CavID = cav.id
)
, CavsP AS 
(
	SELECT * 
	FROM Cavs
	PIVOT (MAX (Cavs.cavValue) FOR cadName IN ([Αρχείο Animation],[URL],[oxScript],[oxPrepend],[oxAppend],[oxService])) AS AvgIncomePerDay
)

SELECT DISTINCT 
	  bd.IL07_CT05_Id 
      ,DR02_Code 
      ,DR10_Code 
      ,CM15_Id 
      ,CM22_Name 
      ,CM22_BrandName 
      ,campaign 
      ,UD02_Code 
      ,HD06_FCode
      ,HD05_PrintedName 
      ,CT04_SignDate 
      ,CT23_StartDate
      ,DATEADD(DAY, -1, CT05_ExpirationDate ) CT05_ExpirationDate
      ,IL09_GL12_Id =
      CASE WHEN PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] ) > 0
      THEN LEFT( g.[Αρχείο Animation], PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] )+4)
      ELSE ('\\junco12\YPSDATA\CaseAttachments\'+g.[Αρχείο Animation]) END 
      ,CT11_TextToPrint = g.URL     
      ,ContractCode 
      ,CT04_Code 
	  ,[oxScript]
	  ,[oxPrepend]
	  ,[oxAppend]
	  ,[oxService]
	  , CASE WHEN UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2B' OR UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2' THEN N'bannerTypeHtml:oxHtml:genericHtml' ELSE N'' END [oxBannerType]
FROM bd 
JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv  ON adv.ID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id 
JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp  ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID AND cp.State <> 3 AND ISNULL(InterruptionDate, GETDATE()+1) >= GETDATE()
JOIN dbo.Contract ct  ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND ct.Type NOT IN (1,10) AND Ct.State NOT IN (3,5,10) 
JOIN CavsP g  ON bd.IL07_CT05_Id = g.advID
WHERE g.[Αρχείο Animation] IS NOT NULL OR oxScript IS NOT NULL

	JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cavAnim  ON cavAnim.ContractProductID = bd.CP_ID 
											   AND cavAnim.AdvertisementID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id
											   AND cavAnim.ProductPartID = pp.ID 
											   AND cavAnim.ContentAttributeDefinitionID = cadAnim.ID
											   and cavAnim.Value is not null
	group by bd.IL07_CT05_Id, cadAnim.NAME
	) a
	JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav ON a.CavID = cav.id
)
, CavsP as 
(
	select * 
	from Cavs
	pivot (max (Cavs.cavValue) for cadName in ([Αρχείο Animation],[URL],[oxScript],[oxPrepend],[oxAppend],[oxService])) as AvgIncomePerDay
)

select distinct 
	  bd.IL07_CT05_Id 
      ,DR02_Code 
      ,DR10_Code 
      ,CM15_Id 
      ,CM22_Name 
      ,CM22_BrandName 
      ,campaign 
      ,UD02_Code 
      ,HD06_FCode
      ,HD05_PrintedName 
      ,CT04_SignDate 
      ,CT23_StartDate
      ,dateadd(day, -1, CT05_ExpirationDate ) CT05_ExpirationDate
      ,IL09_GL12_Id =
      Case when PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] ) > 0
      then LEFT( g.[Αρχείο Animation], PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] )+4)
      else ('\\junco12\YPSDATA\CaseAttachments\'+g.[Αρχείο Animation]) end 
      ,CT11_TextToPrint = g.URL     
      ,ContractCode 
      ,CT04_Code 
	  ,[oxScript]
	  ,[oxPrepend]
	  ,[oxAppend]
	  ,[oxService]
	  , CASE WHEN UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2B' OR UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2' THEN N'bannerTypeHtml:oxHtml:genericHtml' ELSE N'' END [oxBannerType]
from bd 
JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv  ON adv.ID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id 
JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp  ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID AND cp.State <> 3 AND ISNULL(InterruptionDate, GETDATE()+1) >= GETDATE()
JOIN dbo.Contract ct  ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND ct.Type NOT IN (1,10) AND Ct.State NOT IN (3,5,10) 
join CavsP g  on bd.IL07_CT05_Id = g.advID
where g.[Αρχείο Animation] is not null OR oxScript is NOT null

named_assets.name: dbo.XOSMSYPSToEBSActiveBusinessPoints
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[XOSMSYPSToEBSActiveBusinessPoints]  
AS


SELECT  distinct 
[Κωδικός] = bp.Code  ,
[Διακριτικός] = bp.Name, 
[Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName, 
[Είδος πελάτη] = cn.name, 
[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] = (SELECT a.name FROM yps.dbo.ClassifierNode a JOIN yps.dbo.Classification b ON a.id = b.ClassifierNodeID AND b.ClassifierID = 3 AND b.BusinessPointID = bp.id),
[Νομός] = adr.Prefecture,
[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] = (select top 1 id from yps.dbo.Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής] = (select top 1 SignedDate from yps.dbo.Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] =(select MAX(adv.AdvEndDate) from yps.dbo.Contract ct
									join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									),
[Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής] =(select top 1 cp.InterruptionDate from yps.dbo.Contract ct
									join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									order by adv.AdvEndDate desc
									),

--[Τηλέφωνο1]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage =1),
--[Τηλέφωνο2]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 2),
--[Φαξ]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 7),
[Κινητό] = (select top 1 pp.Number
		from yps.dbo.PointPhone pp 
		WHERE pp.IsActive = 1 AND pp.Usage = 4
		AND pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id
		AND pp.Number IS NOT NULL
		ORDER BY 1),
[Ημ/νία Σύγκρισης] = case when ct.OrigionalContractID is null then ct.SignedDate ELSE ct.createdon end

FROM yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp 
LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.CONTRACT ct ON bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID AND ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND ct.type in (0,2,3,4)
join yps.dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.ID = bp.LocationAddressID --731837
join yps.dbo.Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id and cl.ClassifierID = 5 
join yps.dbo.ClassifierNode cn on cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[XOSMSYPSToEBSActiveBusinessPoints]  
AS


SELECT  distinct 
[Κωδικός] = bp.Code  ,
[Διακριτικός] = bp.Name, 
[Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName, 
[Είδος πελάτη] = cn.name, 
[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] = (SELECT a.name FROM yps.dbo.ClassifierNode a JOIN yps.dbo.Classification b ON a.id = b.ClassifierNodeID AND b.ClassifierID = 3 AND b.BusinessPointID = bp.id),
[Νομός] = adr.Prefecture,
[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] = (select top 1 id from yps.dbo.Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής] = (select top 1 SignedDate from yps.dbo.Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4))  order by SignedDate desc),
[Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] =(select MAX(adv.AdvEndDate) from yps.dbo.Contract ct
									join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									),
[Ημερ. Διακοπής  Προβολής] =(select top 1 cp.InterruptionDate from yps.dbo.Contract ct
									join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id
									join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id 
									where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10)  AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) 
									order by adv.AdvEndDate desc
									),

--[Τηλέφωνο1]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage =1),
--[Τηλέφωνο2]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 2),
--[Φαξ]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 7),
[Κινητό] = (select top 1 pp.Number
		from yps.dbo.PointPhone pp 
		WHERE pp.IsActive = 1 AND pp.Usage = 4
		AND pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id
		AND pp.Number IS NOT NULL
		ORDER BY 1),
[Ημ/νία Σύγκρισης] = case when ct.OrigionalContractID is null then ct.SignedDate ELSE ct.createdon end

FROM yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp 
LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.CONTRACT ct ON bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID AND ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND ct.type in (0,2,3,4)
join yps.dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.ID = bp.LocationAddressID --731837
join yps.dbo.Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id and cl.ClassifierID = 5 
join yps.dbo.ClassifierNode cn on cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.id
WHERE bp.IsActive = 1

named_assets.name: dbo.YPSToCollectionComplaints
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE view [dbo].[YPSToCollectionComplaints] as 
(
select distinct bp.code as Customer,t.ID as Ticket,
		ta.communicationtext /*(select top 1 tc.communicationtext from dbo.TicketCommunication tc where tc.TicketID=t.id)*/ ticketDescr,	--Devops2654
       t.CreatedOn as createdon,usr.LastName+' '+ISNULL(usr.firstname,'')  CreatedBy,
       --case when t.result IS NULL  then 'Ανοιχτό' else 'Επίλυση' end Result,
       case when t.Status=0  then 'Ανοιχτό' else 'Κλειστό' end Result,
       rs.Description as Resolution,
       cc.CommentText,cc.CreatedOn CommentCreatedOn,usr2.LastName+' '+ISNULL(usr2.firstname,'')  CommentCreatedBy
from  YPS.dbo.Ticket t
--join dbo.CollectionBridgeActionHistory cl on cl.ActionID = t.DMKey  and cast(cl.BatchID as nvarchar(50)) = t.DMTable and cl.EntityType = 1
join YPS.dbo.[Case] as cs on t.ID = cs.ContextEntityID  and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET'
join YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID=t.BusinessPointID
join YPS.dbo.[User] usr on usr.ID=t.CreatedByID
left join YPS.dbo.TicketResolutionMethod rs on rs.id=t.ResolutionMethodID
left join YPS.dbo.CaseComment cc on cc.CaseID=cs.id
left join YPS.dbo.[user] usr2 on usr2.UserName=cc.CreatedBy
left join (select TicketID, min(CommunicationText) as communicationtext from yps.dbo.TicketCommunication group by TicketID) ta on ta.ticketId = t.ID	--Devops2654
)
named_assets.sql_raw:
CREATE view [dbo].[YPSToCollectionComplaints] as 
(
select distinct bp.code as Customer,t.ID as Ticket,
		ta.communicationtext /*(select top 1 tc.communicationtext from dbo.TicketCommunication tc where tc.TicketID=t.id)*/ ticketDescr,	--Devops2654
       t.CreatedOn as createdon,usr.LastName+' '+ISNULL(usr.firstname,'')  CreatedBy,
       --case when t.result IS NULL  then 'Ανοιχτό' else 'Επίλυση' end Result,
       case when t.Status=0  then 'Ανοιχτό' else 'Κλειστό' end Result,
       rs.Description as Resolution,
       cc.CommentText,cc.CreatedOn CommentCreatedOn,usr2.LastName+' '+ISNULL(usr2.firstname,'')  CommentCreatedBy
from  YPS.dbo.Ticket t
--join dbo.CollectionBridgeActionHistory cl on cl.ActionID = t.DMKey  and cast(cl.BatchID as nvarchar(50)) = t.DMTable and cl.EntityType = 1
join YPS.dbo.[Case] as cs on t.ID = cs.ContextEntityID  and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET'
join YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID=t.BusinessPointID
join YPS.dbo.[User] usr on usr.ID=t.CreatedByID
left join YPS.dbo.TicketResolutionMethod rs on rs.id=t.ResolutionMethodID
left join YPS.dbo.CaseComment cc on cc.CaseID=cs.id
left join YPS.dbo.[user] usr2 on usr2.UserName=cc.CreatedBy
left join (select TicketID, min(CommunicationText) as communicationtext from yps.dbo.TicketCommunication group by TicketID) ta on ta.ticketId = t.ID	--Devops2654
)

named_assets.name: dbo.YPSToCollectionContractFiles
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE view  [dbo].[YPSToCollectionContractFiles] AS 
SELECT  convert(float,bp.Code) as DpsCode,
        '\\junco12\YPSDATA\Contract'as Path,
        cd.Filename as filename
FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp 
JOIN YPS.dbo.Contract c ON bp.id = c.ActualBPOwnerID
JOIN YPS.dbo.ContractDocument cd ON c.ID = cd.ContractID
WHERE c.State <> 3
and   LEFT(Filename,2) <> '\\' 
and   c.MigratedCode is null

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[YPSToCollectionCustomerPhoneEmail]
AS

WITH billingemails AS
(
SELECT     bp.id AS Customerid,
			 BillingEmail = ce.Email,
			 RankEmailID = RANK() over(partition by Cr.BusinessPointID order by cr.id, CE.ID)
FROM         YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp 
		JOIN YPS.dbo.ContactRelationship cr ON bp.ID = cr.BusinessPointID AND cr.ContactRelationshipTypeID = 20 AND cr.IsActive = 1
		JOIN YPS.dbo.Contact ct ON cr.ContactID = ct.ID
		JOIN YPS.dbo.ContactEmail ce ON ct.ID = ce.ContactID
)
, billingphones AS
(
SELECT     bp.id AS Customerid,
			 BillingPhone = pp.Number,
			 RankPhoneID = RANK() over(partition by pp.BusinessPointID order by pp.ID  /*20150804 Bugzilla 1111 */desc)
FROM         YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp 
		JOIN YPS.dbo.PointPhone pp ON bp.ID = pp.BusinessPointID AND pp.Usage = 9 AND pp.IsActive = 1
)
, emails AS
(
SELECT     bp.id AS Customerid,
			 Email = pe.Email,
			 RankEmailID = RANK() over(partition by pe.BusinessPointID order by pe.ID)
FROM         YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp 
		JOIN YPS.dbo.PointEmail pe ON bp.ID = pe.BusinessPointID 
),
/*20150804 Bugzilla 1111 companyphones AS
(
SELECT * , SortRank = 1 FROM dbo.PointPhone 
WHERE Usage = 3 AND IsActive = 1
),*/
workphones AS
(
SELECT * , SortRank = 2 FROM YPS.dbo.PointPhone 
WHERE Usage = 1 AND IsActive = 1
),
restphones AS
(
SELECT * , SortRank = 3 FROM YPS.dbo.PointPhone pp
WHERE Usage NOT IN (4,7) AND IsActive = 1
/*20150804 Bugzilla 1111 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM companyphones cp WHERE cp.Number = pp.Number)*/
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM workphones wp WHERE wp.Number = pp.Number))
,
allphones AS
(
/*20150804 Bugzilla 1111 SELECT * FROM companyphones 
UNION */
SELECT * FROM workphones
UNION
SELECT * FROM restphones
),
selectedphones AS
(
SELECT ap.businesspointid, ap.number,
PhoneRank = RANK() over(partition by ap.BusinessPointID order by ap.SortRank, ap.ID /*20150804 Bugzilla 1111 */desc)
FROM allphones ap
join BusinessPoint bp on bp.id = ap.BusinessPointID 
where not exists (select 1 from cardinal12.xoentersoft.dbo.EBSToCollectionCustomerAddress e where bp.code = e.MainCustomerCode collate Greek_CI_AS and (e.Telephone1  = ap.Number collate Greek_CI_AI or ap.Number collate Greek_CI_AI = Telephone2 ))
)--,
--phonesCorrection as 
--(
--SELECT /*top 200*/ CustomerCode = bp.Code ,--DEV-9163
--		em.BillingEmail,
--		ph.BillingPhone,
--		Email2 = m.email,
--		Phone2 = ph2.Number,
--		Phone3 = ph3.Number,
--		ROW_NUMBER() over (order by bp.Code) as rownum
		

		
--FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp
--LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, billingemail FROM billingemails WHERE RankEmailID = 1) em ON em.customerid = bp.id
--LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, billingphone FROM billingphones WHERE RankPhoneID = 1) ph ON ph.customerid = bp.ID
--LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, email FROM emails WHERE RankEmailID = 1 ) m ON m.customerid = bp.ID--DEV-9163 changed 2 to 1
--LEFT JOIN (SELECT businesspointid, number FROM selectedphones sp WHERE PhoneRank = 1) ph2 ON ph2.businesspointid = bp.id--DEV-9163 changed 2 to 1
--LEFT JOIN (SELECT businesspointid, number FROM selectedphones sp WHERE PhoneRank = 2) ph3 ON ph3.businesspointid = bp.id--DEV-9163 changed 3 to 2
--WHERE (em.BillingEmail IS NOT NULL OR
--		ph.BillingPhone IS NOT NULL OR
--		m.email IS NOT NULL OR
--		ph2.number is NOT NULL OR
--		ph3.number is NOT null)
--)

SELECT /*top 200*/ CustomerCode = bp.Code ,--DEV-9163
		em.BillingEmail,
		ph.BillingPhone,
		Email2 = m.email,
		Phone2 = ph2.Number,
		Phone3 = ph3.Number--,
		--0 as rownum
		--ROW_NUMBER() over (order by bp.Code) as rownum
		

		
FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp
LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, billingemail FROM billingemails WHERE RankEmailID = 1) em ON em.customerid = bp.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, billingphone FROM billingphones WHERE RankPhoneID = 1) ph ON ph.customerid = bp.ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, email FROM emails WHERE RankEmailID = 1 ) m ON m.customerid = bp.ID--DEV-9163 changed 2 to 1 // 20161209
LEFT JOIN (SELECT businesspointid, number FROM selectedphones sp WHERE PhoneRank = 1) ph2 ON ph2.businesspointid = bp.id--DEV-9163 changed 2 to 1 // 20161209
LEFT JOIN (SELECT businesspointid, number FROM selectedphones sp WHERE PhoneRank = 2) ph3 ON ph3.businesspointid = bp.id--DEV-9163 changed 3 to 2 // 20161209
WHERE (em.BillingEmail IS NOT NULL OR
		ph.BillingPhone IS NOT NULL OR
		m.email IS NOT NULL OR
		ph2.number is NOT NULL OR
		ph3.number is NOT null)
--and cast(bp.ModifiedOn as date) = cast(getdate() as date)
--and not exists (select 1 
--			      from itapps.dbo.CtCollectPhoneUpdateDEV9163 ia 
--				 where ia.CustomerCode = bp.code 
--                   and ia.rownum <= 1002200
--			   ) 
--union 		
--SELECT *		
--FROM itapps.dbo.CtCollectPhoneUpdateDEV9163 pc
--WHERE  pc.rownum > 1002200

named_assets.name: dbo.YPSToCollectionCustomerScore
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[YPSToCollectionCustomerScore] AS 

SELECT  bp.code AS CustomerCode
	  , cn.id,cn.name as score	
FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp 
JOIN YPS.dbo.Classification cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID

named_assets.name: dbo.YPSToCollectionCustomersDetails
named_assets.sql_normalized:
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[YPSToCollectionCustomersDetails] AS 

SELECT  bp.code AS CustomerCode
      , cn.id AS ClassificationId
      , CASE	  
			WHEN cl.ClassifierID = 3 THEN 1
			ELSE 2
		END AS ClassificationType 
	  , CustomerCategoryId = (SELECT icn.id
	                          FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint ibp
	                          JOIN YPS.dbo.Classification icl ON ibp.ID = icl.BusinessPointID
	                          JOIN YPS.dbo.ClassifierNode icn ON icl.ClassifierNodeID = icn.ID
	                         WHERE icl.ClassifierID = 7
	                           AND ibp.id = bp.id )  	
		, CustomerCategoryDescription = g.Description
FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp 
JOIN YPS.dbo.Classification cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID
JOIN YPS.dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.ID
join cardinal12.XOEntersoft.dbo.EBSToCollectionCustomerCategory g on g.Code = (SELECT icn.id
	                          FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint ibp
	                          JOIN YPS.dbo.Classification icl ON ibp.ID = icl.BusinessPointID
	                          JOIN YPS.dbo.ClassifierNode icn ON icl.ClassifierNodeID = icn.ID
	                         WHERE icl.ClassifierID = 7	
	                           AND ibp.id = bp.id )											--2024-03-21 Devops3366
WHERE cl.ClassifierID IN ( 3, 4 )
named_assets.sql_raw:

	                          JOIN YPS.dbo.Classification icl ON ibp.ID = icl.BusinessPointID
	                          JOIN YPS.dbo.ClassifierNode icn ON icl.ClassifierNodeID = icn.ID
